continue_countdownToContinue: If nothing happens in {seconds} seconds, click "Continue".
emailOrPhone.empty: Enter an email or phone number
error_emptyVerificationCode: Please enter the verification code from your {device}.
error_invalidRedirectLink: Seems like {continueLink} is not part of {platformName}! For your safety, we'll take you to {defaultLink}.
birthday_prompt: Add a birthday to your account.
birthday_promptCreate: We will customize {platformName} for you and your learner's age. Only you and your learner can see this information.
name_promptCreate: Add your learner's {name} for your learner.
name_promptEnd: You may edit this information at any time.
region_cantFind: Can't find your country or region? Click here.
selectProfile_noOrgTitle: You are not part of an organization.
selectProfile_noOrgSubtitle: Please join an organization to use {platformName}.
emailOrPhone.label: Email or phone
PHONE_NUMBER_NOT_VERIFIED: Your phone number hasn't been verified
ERROR_INPUT_INVALID_FORMAT: You didn't enter a valid email/phone number
authentication.error.generic.title: Oops!
authentication.error.generic.body:
Something went wrong on our side!
Please try again or contact your organization admin.
selectProfile.noProfiles.title: Hi cadet!
selectProfile.noProfiles.body: As your account is not linked to an organization, please wait until your school registers you to access the hub.
signOut.error:
Something went wrong signing you out!
Please retry or contact your organization admin.
signOut.inProgress: You are being signed out from KidsLoop
signOut.success.title: Success!
signOut.success.body:
You have been signed out of KidsLoop.
Please close this window.
signOut.success.body.withIdentityProvide:
You have been signed out of KidsLoop.
Please close this window and return to {identityProvider}.
